testcase.name: TC1202_Employee should see all the information through "View" button and can edit from View Page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User clicks on View button on a customer..............................passed And User clicks on Back button..............................................passed And User clicks on View button on a customer................................passed And User clicks on Edit button..............................................passed
